Address.label: Address
Address.value: 400 BURRARD STREET,SUITE 1400, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6C 3A6, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Sandstorm Gold Ltd provides financing to companies engaged in gold mining through gold stream and royalty. Geographically, the company has operational footprints in North America, South & Central America, Africa, and Asia & Australia. The firm's royalties include Hod Maden, Santa Elena, Chapada, and Cerro Moro.
